trans-unit.source: Provides data for the context menu event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição horizontal do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the mouse.
When the user opens a context menu by right clicking the mouse, this property returns the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário abre um menu de contexto clicando com botão direito do mouse, essa propriedade retorna a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties does not affect the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs.CursorLeft%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> propriedades não afeta o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs.CursorLeft%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the user opens a context menu by using the keyboard, or when the context menu closes, the value of this property is -1.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário abre um menu de contexto usando o teclado, ou quando fecha o menu de contexto, o valor dessa propriedade é -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição vertical do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the mouse.
When the user opens a context menu by right clicking the mouse, this property returns the position of the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário abre um menu de contexto clicando com botão direito do mouse, essa propriedade retorna a posição do mouse.

trans-unit.source: Specifying the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties does not affect the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs.CursorTop%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> propriedades não afeta o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs.CursorTop%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the user opens a context menu by using the keyboard, or when the context menu closes, the value of this property is -1.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário abre um menu de contexto usando o teclado, ou quando fecha o menu de contexto, o valor dessa propriedade é -1.
